meanings.definition: A U-shaped metal fitting with holes at the ends for attaching to a rod or chain.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic used clevises to secure the chain to the hook.
meanings.sent2: I bought new clevises to fix the broken swing set.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to use the clevises as a makeshift swing.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship acted like the clevises, holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: The shiny clevises clinked together as the wind chime swayed.
